data.title: Samuel Dalembert, arrested for attacking his partner
data.text:
Center Samuel Dalembert will face criminal charges after being arrested last Sunday by the Boca Raton (Florida) police. As reported AP, the Canadian player of Haitian origin was arrested by the police for assaulting his girlfriend and his partner's cousin. According to the woman's testimony, Samuel Dalembert, angry because his girlfriend was going to Orlando with their two children, pushed her to the ground and grabbed his cousin's neck while trying to intervene. The pivot He was later released on two counts of violent assault.

Dalembert, with 13 years of experience in the NBA including spells for 6 different teams, had renewed this summer for Shanxi Zhongyu of the Chinese league. In 2015-16, after doing the preseason in Dallas, he joined his current team in December, averaging 12,5 points, 11,4 rebounds and 2,2 blocks per game. The Canadian international is still active at 35 years old after a disappointing last NBA season with the Knicks. In 2014-15, Dalembert only played 32 games in New York before being released in January.
